src:
Watch: The day after the Mercedes party: "We were not good at singing"
07 Nov 2019, 07:59 by Matt Gretton

Toto Wolff, Valtteri Bottas and Lewis Hamilton all sat around the table to record a thank you message for the Mercedes social media channels. The team boss also gives a bit of insight into the party celebrations and it sounds like the team did some singing!
